Game List.Name: Chess
Game List.Description: A strategic board game played between two players on a checkered board.
Game List.Rules: Each player starts with 16 pieces: 1 king, 1 queen, 2 rooks, 2 knights, 2 bishops, and 8 pawns. Each piece moves differently. The objective is to checkmate the opponent's king.

Game List.Name: Truth or Dare or Drink
Game List.Description: A party game where players choose between answering a question truthfully, performing a dare, or taking a drink.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns nominatig themselves to either (a) tell a personal truth, or (b), perform a dare. If they refuse to do either, they must take a drink.

Game List.Name: Cards Against Humanity
Game List.Description: A party game in which players complete fill-in-the-blank statements using words or phrases typically deemed as offensive.
Game List.Rules: One player reads a prompt card, and the other players submit their funniest response cards. The reader chooses the best one.

Game List.Name: 70 Second Scrawls
Game List.Description: A fast-paced drawing game where players have 70 seconds to draw 10 different prompts.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns drawing prompt cards from a deck, and have 70 seconds to draw all 10 prompts. The other players guess what the drawings are. The player with the most correct guesses wins.

Game List.Name: Ultimate Drinking Cards
Game List.Description: A drinking game where players draw cards and follow the instructions on them, which often involve taking drinks or performing dares.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns drawing cards from a deck. Each card has a different instruction, such as taking a drink, giving a drink, or performing a dare. The game continues until players decide to stop.

Game List.Name: Joking Hazard
Game List.Description: A party game where players create comic strips using cards with images and captions.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns being the judge and drawing cards to create a comic strip. The judge chooses the funniest combination, and the player with the most points wins.

Game List.Name: Wordshake
Game List.Description: A word game where players try to find as many words as possible in a grid of letters within a time limit.
Game List.Rules: Players shake a grid of lettered dice and then have 3 minutes to find as many words as possible by connecting adjacent letters. Words must be at least 3 letters long.

Game List.Name: Wordsmash
Game List.Description: A fast-paced card game of word association and lightning mental reflexes, Noggin encourages clever and witty responses conjured from two random letters of the alphabet.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns drawing cards and must come up with a word that matches the criteria, and starts with the two letters on the card. The first player to say a word wins the round.
